replies.author: å°æµª47ä¸€ä¸€ä¸€
replies.txt_content:
First of all, please read the post [rules and regulations, points, grades, medals] of minecraft Chinese Forum, especially the rules and regulations in it must be read clearly, otherwise you may be punished for violating one of them unintentionally. Secondly, please read the exclusive edition rules of each board (based on the general rules of minecraft Chinese Forum). If you think that you have been punished by the management staff, you may be punished Fair treatment, please appeal.

About AuditingAudit, that is, your posts (including replies) contain words added to the list of sensitive words by the administrator. Since there is no reminder in the review, please send a private message to the moderator of the board when the post contains sensitive words. Otherwise, once the review time is late, the post will sink to a very late page (when you are reminded when you post, your post has actually been published, but others can't see it, only the moderator can see it in the background, if the moderator does not review it in time Core, other posts on this board will be answered or someone will post your post back.)How to prevent auditWhen posting, it is best to check whether there is any sensitive content. As the forum does not disclose the list of sensitive words, you can only rely on your own "feeling", but as long asWeapons related to violence, such as knives and guns,When it comes to politics, it goes without saying,Concerning harmony, such as grass and horse,There are also advertising machines, asking for agency. Some people recommend businesses. There are too many sensitive words.For example: the word "Shang Â· Hai", then only need to separate the wordExample: shanghaihai

replies.author: Xiao2
replies.txt_content:
æœ¬å¸–æœ€åç”± Xiao2 äº 2020-7-29 20:01 ç¼–è¾‘ 

Hi ,I am Xiao2,a Minecraft lover in this BBS liked forum.
Welcome to our big family.
Aimed at making a better environment for more Chinese MCers,MCBBS has built up a friendly,loverly and open community.
You can see it as the minecraftforum abroad.

However,because the amount of the file about MC,mod and texture in Chinese is too few,our forum's source from our own hand in years ago became a very small part .
But by translating from English web Courseforge,learning from yours better source makers and fixing with our Chinese features,our people have become more brave to show our creation in worldwide Minecraft world.

Now,our players have not only brought new things from abroad to our Chinese type forums,but also brought our new, magnificent,wonderful work to the worldwide.

I have been in the forum for 6 years.6 years have witnessed the big changes taking place in MC's everywhere,and our Chinese forum has being more active,more beautiful and more confident.

Here I show you the website our mod translating works
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... r=typeid&typeid=135
And the website our own mod
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... r=typeid&typeid=294

Among the mods,the Tea the Story with its Chinese features earns many lovers in worldwide.Here is https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tea-the-story

I myself is also a mod translater.The first time meeting Better Foliage I had been in love with the beautiful world.
Here is the translating links https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-368303-1-1.html

Saying textures,I must recommend you theshengling
making the MC world more green and comfortableï¼Œwhich is now became a highlight.

Our "world"s are mostly made by ourselves.Everyday there are excellent work earns our love.
Like the BlakeJack with its commandings and view's feasts

Sorry to hear someone suspect your identification,I think that he just regarded this as a joke.
And I am sorry for my Chinglish.

tips:Our Chinese humor is everywhere.The google will mistake sometime,so if there is something you can't understand,please igore it or ask me.
